list_translation_mean.translate_mean: bức thành nối hai pháo đài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of material suspended at the top to form a covering or screen, typically one of a pair at a window.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she drew the curtains and lit the fire
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô rút rèm cửa và thắp lửa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: provide with a curtain or curtains.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: is it OK if we only curtain the lower windows?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có ổn không nếu chúng ta chỉ rèm cửa sổ dưới?
